name: woood-delivery-date-picker
description: WOOOD Delivery Date Picker - Modern Shopify Checkout Extension with React Query, itty-router, and webhook-based architecture powered by Cloudflare Workers for global performance

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:workers" "wait-on https://localhost:8787/health && npm run dev:shopify" --names "workers,shopify" --prefix-colors "blue,green" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.dev:staging: concurrently "npm run dev:workers:staging" "wait-on https://localhost:8788/health && npm run dev:shopify:staging" --names "workers-staging,shopify-staging" --prefix-colors "yellow,orange" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.dev:production: concurrently "npm run dev:workers:production" "wait-on https://localhost:8789/health && npm run dev:shopify:production" --names "workers-prod,shopify-prod" --prefix-colors "red,magenta" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.build: npm run build:workers && npm run build:extensions
scripts.build:workers: cd workers && npm install && wrangler build
scripts.build:extensions: cd extensions/date-picker && npm install && npm run build && cd ../shipping-method && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:workers && npm run deploy:shopify
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:workers:staging && npm run deploy:shopify:staging
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run deploy:workers:dev && npm run deploy:shopify:dev
scripts.secrets:staging: cd workers && wrangler secret put --env staging
scripts.secrets:production: cd workers && wrangler secret put --env production
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd workers && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../extensions/date-picker && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../shipping-method && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd workers && npm install && cd ../extensions/date-picker && npm install && cd ../shipping-method && npm install
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: WOOOD Development Team
